item.description:
Summer is in full-swing and the night life is heating up!

Come join us this Friday night at one of Boston's best lounges, Excelsior! This is a great place to meet new and current members in a low key and intimate setting, before heading out to one of the near-by clubs in the area. This is a great event to meet new people and to get your groove on! New and current members welcome, and feel free to bring a friend or two!

DETAILS: We will meet at 8pm in the bar area at Excelsior. This is a cozy bar lounge, so finding the group should not be difficult. We will head over to one of the local clubs (to be determined - Mansion, Gypsy Bar, Liquor Store, etc.) around 9:30pm to beat the lines. Please meet us at Excelsior, and get there early as to have time to meet folks and beat the lines later. Cover: None for Excelsior, but there will be a cover for the club.

FIND THE ORGANIZER: My picture is located on the left-hand side of the site. For help/questions, my cell: 646.541.0708.

Please dress appropriately as this is an upscale venue. If traveling by T, Boylston the closest T stop on the green line.

Hope to see you there! Charlie
item.how_to_find_us: My picture is on the left hand side of the web site. Call me for assistance.
item.why: It's a Friday night in the summer in Boston!

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Downtown Boston Nightlife Mixer and Dancing This Friday, June 27!
